qwirkle.server

Class ClientHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • qwirkle.server.ClientHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientHandler
extends java.lang.Thread
    Handles all things related to a client that is connected to the server. It reads from the input, and writes to the output. It runs on a separate thread, and handles all communication to the client.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

        type - Description of how game ended
        winner - If game ended by winning, send the winner
